By the King. A proclamation for restoring goods imbezzell'd during the late fire and since. England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II) Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
2 sheets (versos blank)
Printed by John Bill and Christopher Barker, printers to the Kings most excellent Majesty, London : 1666.
"Given at our court at Whitehall the nineteenth day of September in the eighteenth year of our reign.". Steele notation: Arms 79 was ers 2) if re-. Copy at C18:1[201] consists of single sheet. Reproduction of original in the British Library.
=======
